name: RGB Pixel Bot
description:
Pixel art inspired by the classic retro games from the arcades but with an original game mechanics, you can enjoy this unique experience by playing it on our DIGIBOY 3000 emulator.

How high can you go?

The ideal game for people who like to surpass themselves!

:::How to play::: ( I can't believe you are reading this! )

We believe you can figure it out yourself, but ok, we can help.
Change the color of your bot with a simple tap on the button. Match the color of the platform you want to land on. Jump from platform to platform as high as you can!

:::Features:::

16 bit pixel art graphics
different characters
Emulated on the DIGIBOY 3000
Playable only with the on screen buttons
Several power ups
2 game modes (Classic and Survival)
